name: OneGoldenMinute
description:
A game where you choose the blocks that will aid you in your journey to a chest full of gold, but beware the more blocks you add the lest time you have.

 Controls 

Arrows or wasd to move the character

Arrows or wasd to move the camera during Edit Mode

Space to Jump

Esc to pause 

R to reset 

Left Click and drag the objects in your purse to the grid

Right click placed objects to set their activation time. When the timer reaches an object's activation time it will perform it's task and then destroy itself.
